posts: Building in public:  When your "MVP" is actually a "Minimum Viable Panic Attack."  😂  Relatable? #buildinpublic #startuplife

Good morning, builders!  ☕️  Ever accidentally tweeted your entire business plan while sleep-deprived?  Share your funniest #BuildInPublic fails!  Let's laugh and learn together. #MorningMotivation #IndieHackers
